nodes.html:
<form action="/search" method="get" role="search">
    
    <input name="q" type="text" placeholder="Search store..." class="search-box hint text small">
    
    <button class="search"><svg class="fw--icon fw--icon--search">
  <use xlink:href="#fw--icon--search"></use>
</svg></button>
  </form>

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > ul > li:nth-child(6) > a > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > footer > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL
